channel.title: Okay, changing exp gains for smithing and crafting on a figment source
channel.description: name says it all... how can i do it? ive been looking and looking and i dont see a way to change it... and the skill wont work 100% anything above steel wont work...

item.title: Okay, changing exp gains for smithing and crafting on a figment source
item.dc:creator: @BACON555 BACON555
item.description:
@BACON555 wrote:

cwg452003:

Find the case number that corresponds to the object you are working on and under it find the “addSkillXP” Change the number in there to how ever much xp you want it to add.

ya i looked for that and it just says something weird… not numbers

Read full topic
item.source: Okay, changing exp gains for smithing and crafting on a figment source
